title: From Robots to Agents: SS&C Blue Prism Guides the Automation Evolution
excerpt: SS&C Blue Prism is leading the charge from robotic process automation (RPA) to the brave new world of agentic AI. In this engaging look at the automation revolution, we explore how organizations can navigate the transition and unlock the full potential of autonomous systems.
content:
## The Rise of the Agentic Machines

For organizations still firmly entrenched in the world of robotic process automation (RPA), the idea of embracing agentic AI as the next step in automation might seem downright terrifying. But fear not, because SS&C Blue Prism is here to guide you on this journey, one step at a time.

While RPA has been a game-changer in the world of business process optimization, the time has come to think beyond the rigid confines of rule-based bots. Enter the era of agentic automation - intelligent systems capable of adapting, learning, and making decisions on their own. It's a bold new frontier, and SS&C Blue Prism is leading the charge.

## The Intelligent Evolution of Automation

Imagine your RPA bots as the caterpillars of the automation world. Dutifully crawling through their predefined tasks, they've served their purpose well. But now, it's time for them to undergo a metamorphosis - to shed their robotic exoskeletons and emerge as fully-fledged agentic automations.

These intelligent agents don't just follow orders; they anticipate needs, make decisions, and adapt to changing circumstances. It's a fundamental shift in the way we approach automation, and SS&C Blue Prism is here to ensure your organization makes a smooth transition.

## Unlocking the Power of Autonomous Systems

With agentic automation, the possibilities are truly endless. Imagine a world where your digital workforce not only completes tasks but also identifies opportunities for optimization, initiates process improvements, and even collaborates with human colleagues in ways you've never seen before.

It's a future where automation isn't just a tool, but a strategic partner in driving business growth and innovation. And SS&C Blue Prism is at the forefront of this transformation, empowering organizations to harness the full potential of autonomous systems.

## The Agents of Change

So, how exactly does one move from the rigid confines of RPA to the boundless potential of agentic automation? SS&C Blue Prism has the answers, guiding customers through a seamless transition that unlocks the true power of intelligent automation.

It's a journey that requires a shift in mindset, a willingness to embrace change, and a deep understanding of the evolving automation landscape. But with SS&C Blue Prism as your trusted partner, the path forward is clear - and the rewards are well worth the effort.

title: Unicorns of AI: 17 U.S. Startups That Hit the Big Time in 2026
excerpt: A new generation of AI unicorns has emerged, with 17 U.S. startups raising over $100 million in 2026. From machine learning powerhouses to autonomous agents, these companies are redefining the future of enterprise technology.
content:
## The $1 Billion AI Titans

If 2026 has taught us anything, it's that the AI gold rush is in full swing. Three U.S. AI companies have minted new unicorn status, raising a staggering $1 billion or more this year alone. These AI titans are set to transform industries, from logistics to healthcare.

## The $100 Million Club

But the unicorns aren't the only ones cashing in. Fourteen other U.S. AI startups have managed to raise a cool $100 million or more in 2026, demonstrating the insatiable demand for cutting-edge machine learning and automation technologies. These upstarts are poised to give the big players a run for their money.

## Automating the Enterprise

Whether it's optimizing supply chains, streamlining customer service, or revolutionizing medical diagnostics, this new generation of AI companies is laser-focused on solving real-world problems for businesses. By packaging complex algorithms into user-friendly platforms, they're making AI adoption more accessible than ever before.

## Agents of Change

One particularly intriguing trend is the rise of autonomous AI agents - virtual assistants capable of handling a wide range of tasks with minimal human intervention. These self-sufficient systems are poised to transform how we interact with technology, blurring the line between human and machine intelligence.

## The Future is Bright (and Intelligent)

With billions in funding and a relentless pursuit of innovation, these AI startups are charting a course for a future where intelligent systems are seamlessly woven into the fabric of our lives. As we navigate the promises and perils of this brave new world, one thing is certain: the AI revolution is just getting started.

Join us as we dive into the details of the 17 U.S. AI companies that have reached new heights in 2026.
